bibl.title: Postcard from Clarence P. Jones to Emilie Lawrence Reed, September 28, 1927

div1.p: Jones informs Emilie Lawrence Reed of the date for the Belroi dedication

div1.head: Postcard from Clarence P. Jones to Emilie Lawrence Reed, September 28, 1927
div1.opener:
C1
B13
DR. CLARENCE PORTER JONES
3117 WEST AVENUE
NEWPORT NEWS, VIRGINIA
9/28/27
Dear Mrs. Reed-
div1.p:
I wired you
last night the Commission had
fixed the 15th as the opening
I have just mailed me in relation
to each ofon the list you sent
me a month ago -- In addition
I am mailing you a dozen today
for you to send to any friend
you happened to have overlooked
anticipating genuine pleasure in
meeting you
